job.title: Machine Learning Performance Software Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>The Role<br><br></u></strong>As a member of the Dojo machine learning team, you will be responsible for enabling Tesla’s neural networks to train efficiently on our upcoming in-house custom-silicon supercomputer systems. Join a small team of experienced developers in optimizing and scaling the deployment of our Pytorch-derived neural networks on Tesla's custom massively-parallel Dojo accelerators. Work with many of the same great engineers who delivered Tesla’s custom FSD computer. The ideal candidate has experience with writing software for large distributed systems.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Understand and model the end to end training performance of the Autopilot SW team's Pytorch-derived neural networks on the Dojo system.</li><li>Develop software that scales and improves training performance based on your analysis of bottlenecks</li><li>Collaborate with the Dojo HW team to understand current HW architecture and propose future improvements<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>BS in relevant field (Computer Science, Computer Engineering, etc.)</li><li>Comfortable with C++ and Python</li><li>Capable of delivering results with minimal oversight</li><li>Good communication skills<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Nice To Have<br></u></strong><ul><li>Experience scaling neural network training systems or other large distributed systems</li><li>Familiarity with the internals of Pytorch</li><li>Performance analysis experience</li><li>Experience coding parallel programs</li><li>Able to work from Deer Creek (Palo Alto) office</li><li>Ready to start soon</li></ul>
